title: How to return to screenshot capture by holding Power button and selecting 'Screenshot' after update?
content:
After recent update the screenshot process has changed from a single hand operation (hold Power, select 'Screenshot') two a two handed operation (hold Power AND Volume Down at the same time) that is inconsistent and inconvenient. I  addition to needing two hands it also often leads to the screenshot having the volume control display in the bloody capture.

What options exist to correct this?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
